SECRET.CP. 252 (54).C A 3 I IT ST.U^EI-tPLC^-MIT ASSjgTAKCE BOARD - DRAFT REGULATIONS.Memorandum by the Minister of Labour.I anticipate that it will be possible for the Unemployment Assistance Board to let tie have their Draft Regulations before Wednesday, 31st October. In view of the urgency of the matter, I suggest that the Regulations should be referred at once to a Cabinet Committee for detailed examination, and that the Committee should be asked to report to the Cabinet if the Regulations are satisfactory.(Intld.) 0. S.25th October, 1934.COPY NO. ^It. Q. 800-65. J.D.
